title: PICS: The 1975, Sho Madjozi and Shekhinah kick off day one of Rocking the Daisies
text:
PICS: The 1975, Sho Madjozi and Shekhinah kick off day one of Rocking the Daisies





Cape Town – Fans gathered at Cloof Wine Estate on Friday for one of Cape Town’s biggest music festival, Rocking the Daisies.

Day one kicked off with a performance by Nkosi Zithulele as he opened the CAN DO! main stage.

As the sun began to sit, Shekhinah, Mi Casa and Sho Madjozi took the stage, as well as international act, The 1975.

The festival saw thousands rock out in the early hours of the morning, and day two promises to be a dream with performances by Nasty C, Cassper Nyovest and YoungstaCPT.

SEE VIDEOS AND PICTURES FROM DAY ONE HERE:

Compiled by Bashiera Parker
description: One of Cape Town’s biggest music festivals kicks off with a bang, seeing local and international artists take the stage.
